recipeInstructions.text: Add water to a Dutch oven to a depth of 2 inches; bring to a boil. Add leek; cover and simmer 5 minutes. Add zucchini, squash, and bell pepper; cover and simmer 5 minutes. Drain well; pat vegetables dry with paper towel.
Place flour in a bowl; cut in butter with a pastry blender until it resembles coarse meal. Sprinkle ice water over mixture; toss with a fork until moist.

Press mixture gently into a 4 inch circle on heavy-duty plastic wrap; cover with additional wrap. Chill 20 minutes. Roll dough, still covered, into a 12 inch circle. Place dough in freezer 5 unites or until plastic wrap can be easily removed.
Preheat oven to 450F. Remove 1 sheet of plastic wrap; fit dough into a 9 inch quiche dish or pie plate coated
